item.title: What is comprehensible input? Here's what language learners need to know
item.description: Comprehensible input is anything in your target language hat you can mostly understand. And research shows it’s the key to language acquisition.

item.title: How I self-taught German to C1 using immersion — despite being busy and disorganized
item.description: As one reader put it, teaching myself German took “2 years of not really doing much actually”

item.title: How I Passed the Goethe B2 German Exam With a Nearly Perfect Score
item.description: Last week on Monday I officially went from monoglot to… duo-glot? Bilingual sounds wrong. I didn’t grow up speaking two languages. Anyways, as a newly minted official Goethe Institute certified B2 German speaker, I wanted to stop and share how I prepped for the test—and really, how I didn’t prep for the test.
